title: Change the Search Order
description:
Hi,
I m using solr 1.3

I m trying to change the order of the fields diplyed in the search result. Rightnow it's displaying in alphabetical field name order i.e field name starting with 'A' displying first, then with 'B' and so on.But i want to display these fields in different order.Can anybody plz give some solution??

It's urgent....

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: Solr doesn't maintain field order (neither does Lucene).

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: But, perhaps the fl parameter specified order should be maintained in the fields in the response?

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: SPRING_CLEANING_2013. We can reopen if there's interest.
